event.title: DeCipher II - Cyber Security and Emerging Threats
event.description:
Nowadays, personal and business operations depend on technologies and computers, so it is easy for attackers to steal information. This is where Cyber Security comes into picture.

Cyber Security is the technology that is designed to protect networks and devices from attack, damage, or unauthorized access. Implementing effective cybersecurity measures is particularly challenging today because there are more devices than people, and attackers are becoming more innovative. These threats to cybersecurity can be dealt by ethical hacking and to spread awareness regarding the same Mr. Ajinkya Lohakare has taken a step forward.

**Mr. Ajinkya Lohakare** , a Cyber Security Researcher & Ethical Hacking Expert, does the security consulting for Fortune 500 companies and law enforcements around the world. He is an expert in dealing with cyber-attacks and cyber-bullying. We'll have a chat with him to understand the relevance of cybersecurity today, spread awareness and understand popular network vulnerabilities and how to prevent the same.

At the end of the webinar one is expected to learn about cyber-threats and ways to overcome those threats.

#### Event Information

- By Ajinkya Lohakare, **7th Nov, 4:00 PM on Youtube Live**
- Gist: A basic overview on cybersecurity and its emerging threats
- Link: [https://youtu.be/IXHOZ1WwQEg](https://youtu.be/IXHOZ1WwQEg)
